name: Drew's Dungeons
description:
IMPORTANT!!!- GameJolt now available :)

https://gamejolt.com/games/drews-dungeons/764296

A completely RNG-based game. Inspired by Zelda, Crypt of the NecroDancer, and the Binding of Isaac. 

Fully animated cutscenes by yours truly.

Original music by me and Luke Hadad.

Some "bugs" are actually features: such as gaps in walls (I call them secret exits), and slimes going through walls (they're supposed to).

Thank you to BMo, GamesPlusJames, and Brackeys, for random things I wanted to learn how to do.

There's 2 endings. Try to get 'em both if you want! I worked really hard on the cutscenes for them.
